weka.etplugin

Class DataInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.AbstractInstance
      • weka.core.DenseInstance
        • weka.etplugin.DataInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Copyable, Instance, RevisionHandler, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class DataInstance
extends DenseInstance
implements TechnicalInformationHandler
    Wrapper class that stores the evaluation data of each classification performed alongside the graphical components to represent that evaluation in the Entropy Triangle. It handles the tooltip windows and the color of the DataPoints if the ActionListener is added, i.e., to the ColorBar.
    Author:
    Antonio Pastor
    See Also:
    DataPoint, DataInstances, ColorBar, Serialized Form

      • DataInstance

        public DataInstance(Instances dataset,
            double weight,
            double[] attValues)
        Constructor that initializes instance variable with given values for the given dataset.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the Instances dataset that this instance belong
        weight - the weight of this instance in the dataset
        attValues - an array with the attributes values of this instance in double format

      • DataInstance

        public DataInstance(Instances dataset,
            Instance instance)
        Constructor that initializes instance variable with given values.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the Instances dataset that this instance belong
        instance - the instance from which the attribute values and the weight are to be copied

    • Method Detail

      • setToolTips

        public void setToolTips()
        Sets and updates the tooltip windows of the DataPoints of this object. This method should be called when any of the information showed in the tooltip may have changed.

      • setColorChangeListener

        public ActionListener setColorChangeListener(ColorBar colorBar)
        Sets an ActionListener to sync the foreground color of the points of this instance in a graph with the given ColorBar.
        Parameters:
        colorBar - the object from where to get the new colors
        Returns:
        ActionListener the ActionListener that can be used by the ColorBar to change the color of the DataPoints of this DataInstance.
        See Also:
        ColorBar

      • setPopupMenus

        public void setPopupMenus(EntropyTrianglePanel etPanel)
        Sets the right-click menu behavior for the points of this instance.
        Parameters:
        etPanel - the panel where the points of this instance is being drawn

      • copy

        public Object copy()
        Produces a shallow copy of this instance. The copy has access to the same dataset.
